name: Design Bundles
description: Design Bundles provides premium and free digital design resources for crafters, graphic designers, and businesses.
longDescription: Design Bundles is a digital marketplace offering a vast library of premium and free design resources, including SVG files, clipart, fonts, and sublimation designs, tailored for crafters, graphic designers, and businesses. The platform aims to empower creatives by providing high-quality, versatile assets that meet rigorous standards. It features a Plus Membership for unlimited access to thousands of designs and includes tools like an AI Art Generator, Illustrate AI, to streamline creative projects. The website also offers educational content through Design School, with tutorials on tools like Cricut and Photoshop. Founded in 2016, Design Bundles serves a global audience, with a core user base in the United States, Canada, and Australia, and supports both personal and commercial use with appropriate licenses.
features: Access thousands of premium and free SVG files, clipart, and fonts for crafting and graphic design projects.
Offers a Plus Membership with unlimited downloads and a commercial license for professional use.
Provides Design School with free tutorials on Cricut, Photoshop, Canva, and other design tools to enhance user skills.
Features Illustrate AI, an AI-powered tool for generating art quickly to boost creative workflows.
Includes a Free Design of the Week, offering a new graphic pack or vector file with a commercial license every seven days.
Supports secure account creation with social media integration for easy access to order history and memberships.
Provides high-quality sublimation PNGs and laser cutting templates for specialized crafting needs.
Offers a dedicated Help Centre with priority support for subscription-related queries and cancellations.
Ensures all designers meet strict quality standards, guaranteeing reliable and professional resources.

faqs.question: What types of design resources are available on Design Bundles?
faqs.answer: Design Bundles offers SVG files, clipart, fonts, sublimation PNGs, mockups, and laser cutting templates for personal and commercial use.

faqs.question: Is there a free plan available on Design Bundles?
faqs.answer: Yes, Design Bundles provides 2500+ free designs and a Free Design of the Week, accessible without a paid subscription.

faqs.question: What is the Plus Membership, and what does it include?
faqs.answer: The Plus Membership offers unlimited access to thousands of premium designs, a commercial license, and priority support, with a free trial available.

faqs.question: How does the Illustrate AI tool work?
faqs.answer: Illustrate AI is an AI-powered feature that generates art in seconds, allowing users to create unique designs quickly for their projects.

faqs.question: Can I cancel my Plus Membership easily?
faqs.answer: Yes, users can cancel their Plus Membership directly in the accountâ€™s Membership Details section with a single click, though a one-time discount offer may appear.

faqs.question: Are the design resources suitable for commercial use?
faqs.answer: Yes, most resources come with a commercial license, allowing users to use designs in products for sale, with specific terms outlined on the site.

faqs.question: What kind of support does Design Bundles offer?
faqs.answer: Design Bundles provides a Help Centre and direct support via mail@designbundles.net for issues like cancellations, refunds, or technical queries.

faqs.question: What is Design School, and how can I access it?
faqs.answer: Design School offers free tutorials on design tools like Cricut and Photoshop, accessible to all users directly on the Design Bundles website.
